labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The timer gets stuck and you can't type in that channel at all.
data.expected_result: The timer should keep counting down and you'll be able to type again.
data.short_description: Rejoining a server when you have slowmode counting down in a channel makes the timer stuck
data.steps_to_repro: - Type in a channel with slowmode - Leave and rejoin the server while slowmode is counting down - Go back to the slowmode channel
